CHAR(11): Replication Conference, Call for Papers
CHAR(11), the conference on Clustering, High Availability, Replication will be held in Cambridge, UK on 11-12 July 2011.
Early bird bookings are available now by card or paypal only. Â£345 plus VAT.
Call for Speakers is now open: please send your talk proposals to speaker@char11.org by April 21. Speakers will be announced by May 3.
